settings.question: Health Food & Snacks
settings.answer_body1: Our online health food shop now stocks all manner of natural products from gluten free foods for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivities, to a variety of healthy food snacks in store and online! Whether you are looking for a lifestyle change or just need some extra vitamins, Well Well Well has it all!

settings.question: Why buy health foods from well well well instead of other retailers?
settings.answer_body1: Our online health food store accommodates all types of dietary restrictions. Our healthy shop online and instore includes vegans, vegetarians, keto and more. Some of these products you can only find at a health food grocery store. Come buy your health food snacks and health food online and in Canada and worldwide at Well Well Well. When searching for “health food store near me” in the Niagara region, we are your top choice. We only offer health foods delivery in the St. Catharines area, please call for more information.
settings.answer_body2: When considering the best natural health care products for moms, it is important to find the right supplements starting from pregnancy. Searching for natural prenatal supplements and vitamins down to buying non toxic natural skin care and beauty products can be overwhelming for new Moms. Our selection is curated to ensure quality control with best industry practice. Since babies and children are much more susceptible to environmental toxins; they have developing digestive, endocrine, and reproductive systems along with a higher surface area to body weight ratio it is important to consider organic and non-toxic all natural baby care products designed specifically for mothers and babies. Now with industry standards established there are organic children's vitamins and organic prenatal vitamins available in Canada. They range from pre & post Natal vitamins & supplements, postpartum recovery supplements, nursing supplements with natural ingredients, lactation teas with organic ingredient, baby wipes, diaper rash products, eco friendly, chemical free, non-toxic and unscented baby wash and shampoos, creams, lotions, and much more. Many mother and baby care products will be labelled for: sensitive skin, baby skin, chemical free and much more. It is very important to understand the labels. At Well Well Well, we take great care in the selection of mom and baby care products we carry. We want to make certain that mothers feel confident in the types of natural baby care products that they are purchasing.

settings.question: What is the benefit of buying organic foods and snacks?
settings.answer_body1: The benefits of shopping organic and non GMO foods and snacks are they are free from toxic chemicals, antibiotics, growth hormones, food dyes and preservatives. Online buying for organic food in Canada and worldwide has never been easier. As a health food retailer and health food store online in Canada we pride ourselves in providing the best possible products to our customers.

settings.question: What are the best health foods to order online?
settings.answer_body1: The best health foods online are the ones that meet your unique needs. Whether it’s for a specific health problem, avoiding gluten in your diet or just to ensure you’re getting all the vitamins and minerals needed to stay healthy, we offer the best health foods online.

settings.question: What are popular health foods to order online in Canada?
settings.answer_body1: The best health foods retailers online are the ones that meet your unique needs. Whether it’s for a specific health problem, avoiding gluten in your pasta, or you just want to ensure you’re getting all the vitamins and minerals needed to stay healthy, we offer the best health foods to order online.

settings.question: How much are the delivery costs when ordering health food online from Well Well Well?
settings.answer_body1: Health food online orders in Canada of $59.99+ or more qualify for free shipping which is automatically calculated during checkout. All other shipping rates will be calculated at checkout depending on your choice of standard or express shipping.  Deliveries are offered for orders $150+ within a 10km radius of our brick and mortar store in St. Catharines. A $5 delivery fee is charged on deliveries.

settings.question: How long do online health food orders take from Well Well Well
settings.answer_body1: All online health food orders require 1-3 business days of processing time. Once your online health food order leaves our warehouse, the delivery time is based on your location. Orders are fulfilled by Canada Post, either by standard or express shipping.
